name: Found?
description:
Found? is a 2D Unity puzzle game created for the 2021 Global Game Jam using C# over 48 hours. The theme for this year's jam was "Lost and Found".

I helped with the design, programming and debugging for this game. I also designed the UI and most of the other design assets for the game in Clip Studio Paint.

Made by: Alessandro Fiorella, Liliana Klein, Carson Lampila. Brandon Service, and Lucas Veldman

*Please note that if you hit the "Exit" button, the web-version of the game will stop running. If you want to play again, simply reload the page.
